meanings.sent1: She delineates the details of the story with great accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The map clearly delineates the boundaries of the city.
meanings.sent3: He delineates his morning routine in a funny comic strip.
meanings.sent4: Her painting skillfully delineates the emotions of the characters.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation delineates the concept perfectly.
